key.description: This value determines what files get filtered from the file browser. Valid values are: none (filter nothing), hide-hidden (filter hidden files) and hide-binary (filter binary files).

Ista valor determina qu├й fichers se filtran de l'examinador de fichers. As valors validas son: "none" (no filtrar), "hide-hidden" (filtrar os fichers amagaus) y "hide-binary" (filtrar os fichers binarios).
